titles.title: College Textbook Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the costs of college textbooks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/1/2005--Introduced. College Textbook Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a nonrefundable tax credit for the cost of college textbooks. Limits the amount of such credit to $1,000 for any taxable year.
